resolution.description: The described issue is not actually a problem - it is as designed.
resolution.name: Not A Problem

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
*Description*
Failed to build Datafusion "0.14.1-SNAPSHOT" on windows 10 with gcc.

*ENV*
OS: Windows 10 home x64
Rust: rustc 1.40.0 (73528e339 2019-12-16)
tool-chain: stable-x86_64-pc-windows-gnu

fields.summary: [RUST]Failed to build Datafusion "0.14.1-SNAPSHOT" on windows 10 with gcc
fields.environment:
OS: Windows 10 home x64
Rust: rustc 1.40.0 (73528e339 2019-12-16)
tool-chain: stable-x86_64-pc-windows-gnu

comments.body: Hi [~huangkaibo], arrow and datafusion currently require nightly. You shouldn't be able to build with stable. Can you try building with nightly?
Closing as not a problem because wrong Rust version was being used.
